name: Sketch 1
descr: Focusing on personal connection by only allowing calls and not instant messages.

name: Sketch 2
descr: Fairly consistent with current public's mental model of what a dating app is. The locked imagery emphasizes the serious relationship aspect.

name: Sketch 3
descr: Heavily features compatibility instead of images, which some may find too surface level with fun/unique messaging imagery.

name: Sketch 4
descr: Focuses on customizability to feature the personality of each user and displays images at the bottom. To emphasize creating relationships, reacting to profiles is the only way to start messaging.
